mapper.select: select sum(f.calorie*im.count) as totalCalorie from food f, intake_member im, health_user hu where im.user_id = hu.user_id and f.food_name = im.food_name and intake_date = #{date} and im.user_id = #{id}

select.if: select sum(e.calorie*cm.ex_hour*pi.weight) as totalCalorie from exercise e, consumption_member cm, (select p.weight, row_number() over(order by physical_no desc) rnum from physical_info p, health_user hu where p.user_id = hu.user_id) pi where e.name = cm.name and pi.rnum = 1 and ex_date = #{date} and cm.user_id = #{id}
